name: CineWatch
description: CineWatch is a comprehensive movie and TV show streaming platform design, focusing on intuitive user experience and dynamic content display. Currently, I am actively implementing download and uploading features, and also developing a system for users to write reviews for shows.

name: Generational Ventures Foundation Website
description: A multi-page website for a non-profit organization focused on community development through sports and education. The site features dynamic content loading, responsive design, and an interactive team page.
features: Dynamic page content via JSON data
Team member profiles with details page

name: Whitewater Rafting Site
description: A multi-page website designed for a whitewater rafting company, showcasing responsive design principles and an engaging user interface. This was one of my early projects.

name: Simulation Bank App and GUI
description: A command-line and graphical user interface application simulating basic banking operations.

name: Simple C# Console App
description: A simple console application built with C# to explore object-oriented programming concepts and language syntax.
